comment.body:
It seems that it's caused by `Online Malicious URL Blocklist`, so please add this rule:
```adblock
||res.cl$badfilter
```
to user rules.

comment.body:
As a temporary solution please add this rule:
```adblock
conservation.forest.gov.tw#@#a[target="_blank"][rel*="nofollow"] > img[src*=".gif"]
```
to user rules.

<hr>

@realodix Could you please take a look?
PDF icon is blocked by this rule:
```adblock
##a[target="_blank"][rel*="nofollow"] > img[src*=".gif"]
```
from `AdBlockID` filter list.

issue.title: qwant.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.1.37

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.qwant.com/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

When using AdGuard annoyance filter the searchbar from qwant.com is missplaced when scrolling instead of being sticky in the header.

## Bug

<details>

<summary>Search is placed in the middle of the page</summary>

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/395137/197490682-796a59a5-e896-446b-bc0b-5eacf0efa43b.png)

</details>

## Expected result 


<details>

<summary>Search should be in the header</summary>

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/395137/197490749-06b251b6-09f9-4917-8fd7-8ba677df4da5.png)

</details>

## Cause

Someone added a rule that overwrites a CSS variable used to position the searchbar `--header-offset`

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: Qwant.com search is missplaced
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.1.37

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.qwant.com/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

When using AdGuard annoyance filter the searchbar from qwant.com is missplaced when scrolling instead of being sticky in the header.

## Bug

<details>
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/395137/197490682-796a59a5-e896-446b-bc0b-5eacf0efa43b.png)
</details>

## Expected result 


<details>
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/395137/197490749-06b251b6-09f9-4917-8fd7-8ba677df4da5.png)
</details>

## Cause

Someone added a rule that overwrites a CSS variable used to position the searchbar `--header-offset`

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
> As a temporary solution please add this rule:
> 
> ```
> conservation.forest.gov.tw#@#a[target="_blank"][rel*="nofollow"] > img[src*=".gif"]
> ```
> 
> to user rules.
> 
> @realodix Could you please take a look? PDF icon is blocked by this rule:
> 
> ```
> ##a[target="_blank"][rel*="nofollow"] > img[src*=".gif"]
> ```
> 
> from `AdBlockID` filter list.

Done, thank you

comment.body:
@jellizaveta пока именно эту проблему воспроизвести не могу, но из-за `Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests` страница https://sravni-labs.ru/ (когда уже залогинен) грузится очень долго или вообще не загружается. Проблема похоже из-за запроса `https://optimizationguide-pa.googleapis.com/v1:GetHints?key=***-***` (замаскировал значение ключа), так как при добавлении такого правила проблема решается:
```
@@||optimizationguide-pa.googleapis.com/v1:GetHints^$stealth
```

issue.body:
This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

---

### Внимание

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установить в Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

pull_request.title: fmkorea.com - tracking
pull_request.body:
## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [X] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [X] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [X] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [X] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [X] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [ ] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

### Enter the issue address

issue.body:
This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

---

### Внимание

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установить в Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

Hi Alex,

Maybe the problem is that the URL you used was incomplete. Here is the full URL, which works: https://forums.realgm.com/boards/viewtopic.php?f=24&t=2222698 <https://forums.realgm.com/boards/viewtopic.php?f=24&t=2222698>

labels.name: A: Problematic

issue.body:
This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

---

### Внимание

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установить в Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)
